Merge pull request #144 from norlab-ulaval/fix-integration-test-lpm-cmake-version-requirement

ci: update bionic integration test to match LPM compiler and update cmake version to lates.

data.author: RedLeaderOne
data.message:
fix: update bionic integration test to match LPM compiler and update cmake version to lates.

- Enhanced the integration test Dockerfile to support Ubuntu 18.04 with updated compilers and CMake, including conditional logic based on distribution version.
- Enabled "EXECUTE_IN_TERMINAL" to true across multiple configuration files, ensuring scripts now run in a terminal environment.

data.author: RedLeaderOne
data.message:
feat: integrate norlab-build-system library and implement linabo-build-system [NMO-405]

- add build system logic for both continuous integration and faster multi-os-version/multi-architecture development workflow
- add user install script for both libnabo and its dependencies
- add contributing instructions
- add JetBrain run configuration for build system
- update NBS and N2ST submodule to latest

data.author: Gregory Jefferis
data.message:
ensure that uint64_t is available

* I missed this because on my setup Eigen/Core (which is included by nabo.h)
  ensures that this is available.

data.author: Gregory Jefferis
data.message:
STY: 3 more newlines at EOF

* missed because I forgot to make clean (ahem)

data.author: Gregory Jefferis
data.message:
STY: newlines at EOF

* clang -Wall -pedantic actually complains about these
* I no longer see any compiler warnings

data.author: Gregory Jefferis
data.message:
unsigned long long -> uint64_t

* apparently unsigned long long is a C++11 extension and is only guaranteed to be >=64 bits
* so use uint64_t which exists since C99

data.author: Gregory Jefferis
data.message:
fix: terminal comma in enum requires C++11

* According to clang finishing an enum with a comma is a C++11 extension
* it doesn't seem worth a compiler warning for one comma!

data.author: Simon Lynen
data.message:
Merge pull request #17 from jefferis/fix/ubsan-maxNodeCount

Fix UBSAN error calculating maxNodeCount

data.author: Gregory Jefferis
data.message:
Fix UBSAN error calculating maxNodeCount

* should use an explicitly uint64 constant
* simplest is to use ULL suffix
  (LLU is apparently standards compliant but not always supported)
* this came up because the nabor R package wrapping libnabo threw a UBSAN error
  for points with dimension = 1
* closes https://github.com/ethz-asl/libnabo/issues/16

data.message: Prevent requesting more points than available in the cloud, prevent the use of empty clouds, bumped version number.

data.message: Merge branch 'master' of git://github.com/ethz-asl/libnabo into HEAD

data.author: Francis Colas
data.message: faster tree heap when less neighbors than requested

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Hopefully fixed detection of missmatched python versions.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Fixed cloud size check for clouds with billions of points.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Updated documentation to reflect the disabling of OpenCL.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Fixed the semantic of epsilon to match the documentation's and ANN's ones.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added ability to pass one radius per point.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added custom command for python target.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Fixed doc and python link command

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Renammed to pynabo, added python install script.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: When number of point is smaller than bucket size, create a single-bucket tree.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Separated doc package from dev package.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added major version in library name.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added bench to select bucket size.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Been kind to Francis and in example compile in a build subdirectory.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Search for Eigen in ROS diamondback by default.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Fixed bug when dimension was not passed.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added const to knn search, bumped version number.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added additional search parameters to specify bucketSize for CPU kd-trees.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Optimized memory structure for CPU-basde kd-tree.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Fixed test case when CL is disabled. Improved verbose output of configuration.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Cleaned-up OpenGL API, marked it as unstable.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Fixed compilation of OpenCL part. Added high-res timer for benches when available.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Search for eigen (3) not explicitely eigen 2.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Result-file header now has the right number of columns.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added virtual destructor to NNS interface to prevent memory leak in children.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added new method for GPU-based kd tree.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Updated to latest draft of C++0x

data.author: Francois Pomerleau
data.message: Fixed compilation when OpenCL is not present

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Fixed implementation to fit new API.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: changes names of variables to avoid overlaying.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Fixed buffer handling for OpenCL, there seems to be still a bug with memory.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: OpenCL glue now works to the point of reporting compilation errors in the source code.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Written OpenCL kernel for knn search, glue is still needed.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Use index instead of values for temporary vector to create nodes, results in a faster creation.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: libnabo now always faster than ANN.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Cleaned-up bench infrastructure, now it is possible to do more than one time each bench.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added reentrant statistics, depends on C++0x.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added ref to points in dist function, equals perfs of ANN.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added explicit bound version of KDTree, ANN style.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: ANN bench now has both search and pri-search

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added stack-based KNN on our structure, same perf as priority_queue... still 2x worst than ANN, memory-bounded?

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Added API to match several points at once.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Fixe includes for Lucid's version of Eigen lib.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Improved performance of search in kdtree.

data.author: Stéphane Magnenat
data.message: Renamed lib, should help compilation with old cmakes.
